content: into the stitch marked with a marker last unworked st making sure to leave a long yarn tail as there will be a small hole between the pant legs which will need sewing up after you have finished this leg round 1 ch1 single_crochet in same st rotate to work in to the next marked st at the front and then single_crochet into each remaining unworked st around join 14sts round 2 ch1 work a tw single_crochet see special stitches into each st around join 14sts fasten_off use starting tail from second leg to sew up the hole between the pant legs hide loose ends shoulder bag made from the bottom up in joined rounds at the end of each round join the last st to the first with a slip_stitch round 1 magic_ring ch1 not a st from now on work 8hdc join as above 8sts round 2 ch1 work 3hdc into the first st half_double_crochet into each of the next 3sts work 3hdc into the next st half_double_crochet into each of the remaining 3sts join as before 12sts round 3 ch1 half_double_crochet into the first st work 3hdc into the next st half_double_crochet into each of the next 5sts work 3hdc into the next st half_double_crochet into each of the remaining 4sts join 16sts round 4 ch1 half_double_crochet into each of the first 2sts work 3hdc into the next st half_double_crochet into each of the next 7sts work 3hdc into the next st half_double_crochet into each of the remaining 5sts join 20sts round 5 ch1 half_double_crochet into each of the first 3sts work 3hdc into the next st half_double_crochet into each of the next 9sts work 3hdc into the next st half_double_crochet into each of the remaining 6sts join 24sts round 6 ch1 half_double_crochet into each of the first 4sts work 3hdc into the next st half_double_crochet into each of the next 11sts work 3hdc into the next st half_double_crochet into each of the remaining 7sts join 28sts round 7 slip_stitch into each of the next 4sts the first already has a slip_stitch in it ch19 loosely slip_stitch into the second chain from the hook slip_stitch loosely into each of the remaining 17chs along then continue to slip_stitch into each of the next 13sts around the top of the bag slip_stitch into the next st and into the opposite end of the chain you just worked into forms the strap then continue to sl sr loosely into each of the remaining 8sts around fasten_off and hide loose ends headband ch48 and join last chain to first with a slip_stitch being careful not to twist the chain make sure that this chain fits snugly around your doll s head round 1 ch1 not a st from now on single_crochet into each st around join the last st to the first with a slip_stitch 48sts rnds 2 & 3 ch1 single_crochet into each st around join 48sts fasten_off and hide loose ends flower make 1 round 1 magic_ring and work
